content.text: The players can use these rules to increase verisimilitude, modify play balance, or emphasize the aspects of the game that they find most appealing. The players must agree on exactly which rules they will use before they start to play. The rules they choose overrule any conflicting rules in the basic game.

This section combines the Advanced Rules and Optional Rules sections of the Second Edition Rulebook. Some of these rules increase the capabilities of the characters, some affect the play balance, and some add entirely new systems that enhance certain aspects of the game. The rules have been reorganized into sections depending on how they affect the game.
